Text.Page:
Mission Orders:

Kerozen Isle has been overrun with dangerous {@LinkCreature:10#1#arachnen warriors}, {@LinkCreature:10#2#grove kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:10#3#virek kamaras}, and {@LinkCreature:10#10#baykun warthogs} that threaten routine troop movements.

Clear the area of hostiles, then report to Edine at the Beachhead.
Now a patrol can actually be a patrol and not a "brutal, bloody fight that ends 50 feet from where it started." Thanks, <PCNAME>.
Kerozen Isle is too important strategically to give over to the native fauna. Seize that island, <PCCLASS:lcase>.
